days.text: Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Light rain at first. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
